text: The A48(M) motorway in Wales links Cardiff with Newport. The A48(M) has no junctions and opened in 1977.Pathetic Motorways – A48(M)The Motorway Archive – M4 Dates == Junctions == A48(M) motorway Eastbound exits Junction Westbound exits M4 London J29 M4 (Castleton) Start of motorway Start of motorway Newport J29A (St Mellons) A48 Cardiff == References == == Other websites == * CBRD Motorway Database – A48(M) * Pathetic Motorways – A48(M) Category:Motorways in Wales
title: A48(M) motorway
